column1: What type of water formation is formed by clouds? \n (A) pearls (B) streams (C) shells (D) diamonds (E) rain (F) beads (G) cooled (H) liquid

Where do beads of water come from? \n (A) Too much water (B) underground systems (C) When the water is too cold (D) Water spills (E) Vapor turning into a liquid (F) Warm air moving into cold air (G) At the peak of a mountain (H) To another location like underground
What forms beads of water?  \n (A) Necklaces. (B) Steam. (C) Glass beads . (D) a wave (E) tiny (F) a solute (G) rain (H) Bracelets.
